name: The Garden (itch) (Matt O'Tousa)
description:
Tend a garden. Grow an ecosystem. Be a God.

All while zoning out to chill music and psychedelic visuals.

"Definitely the prettiest idle clicker I’ve ever played!" - jjjjason

"Had a great experience with your entry" - joemanasco

"5 Stars from me for the Mood. keep it up !" - zax

Thanks for playing :)
